page.name: EDITARBIOPRO
page.Resource: {div style="padding-left:10px;font-size:0.92em;"}{p style="margin-left:-10px;"}Tell your professional activity in a short paragraph explaining your professional achievements and interests. Look at these examples:{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}Lawyer specialised in intellectual property on the Internet. I participate in the defense of the rights of cultural industry, primarily in movie and music worlds. I am interested in management, development and dissemination of Creative Commons licenses.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}Enologist at a winery whose wines are recognized with Guarantee of Origin. I work the full cycle of processing of the grapes and crianza. I combine my work in the laboratory with the role of public relations for the winery in media, marketing and events.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}Telecommunications Engineer with experience in international accounts and, especially, development and management of civil projects in the Middle East. I work as a freelance and my goal is to facilitate business and professional relations between the Arab and Western cultures.{/p}{/div}

{div style="padding-left:10px;font-size:0.92em;"}{p style="margin-left:-10px;"}Describe in detail the responsibilities and objectives of your current job and previous work experience. We give you these examples:{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}I review, correct and supervise the arrival of original documents to the editorial. I prepare reports about the commercial viability of the proposals received.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}Control of employee access to the building and identification of external visits. In turn, I manage the distribution of correspondence to all companies in our office building.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}I run the business strategy of the company in the North: I attract clients and develop personalized proposals. In turn, I am advisor to presidency in Corporate Social Responsibility. I inform and advise them personally{/p}{/div}

{div style="padding-left:10px;font-size:0.92em;"}{p style="margin-left:-10px;"}Describe your degrees and the content of your training in masters, seminars, workshops or courses. Examples:{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}I did the Master 'Online communication' at the Autonomous University of La Rioja to strengthen my knowledge in Web 2.0 and its practical application in traditional media.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}In the Summer 2011 I did a postgraduate degree in International Relations at the London Foreign Affairs School. The course included a four-week practice in the British Embassy in Lagos (Nigeria).{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}I hold the certificate of 'Hairdresser for institutional acts and protocol events', at Academy Nexus. The skills acquired in this course have been implemented in four stays in companies of this sector.{/p}{/div}

{div style="padding-left:10px;font-size:0.92em;"}{p style="margin-left:-10px;"}Describe your academic achievements:{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}I was awarded 'Extraordinary Prize' for best student at the University of Madrid when I finished my studies in Agronomy.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}My project 'Conservation of wetlands' received Prost Foundation award for the best proposal for 2009.{/p}{p}{img src="@1@/img/dotListadoGris.gif" style="margin-right: 3px; margin-left: -10px; "}During my college years I was co-founder of the organization 'ProVegaEspaña'.{/p}{/div}
{strong}Tip:{/strong} You can save your publications in your personal space. {a href="@1@" target="blank"}Go to my personal space{/a}.

page.name: COMADMIN
page.Resource: @1@ connects this community with other ones throught its tags and the categories of the @1@ global index it belongs to:
Any @1@ user can {strong}join{/strong} and contribute to the community (vote, comment, add resources, etc.).
The @1@ users and internet users that aren't members of the community will be allowed to surf the community and consult any of its contents.
The public communities are visible in the @1@ communities directory and their contents can be found in the internet search engines.
The @1@ users that aren't members of a private community cannot enter it.
The private communities are not visible in the @1@ communities directory, and their contents can not be found in the internet search engines.
Any @1@ user can {strong}request access{/strong} to join the community and contribute to it (vote, comment, add resources, etc.).
The @1@ users and internet users that aren't members of @1@ will be allowed to surf the community and consult any of its contents.
The public restricted access communities are visible in the @1@ communities directory and their contents can be found in the internet search engines.
The @1@ users that aren't members of a private room cannot enter it.
The private rooms are NOT visible in the @1@ communities directory and neither are their resources in the internet search engines.
The community members, like the rest of the @1@ users, can only surf the community and explore its contents.

The community will be closed, but before that it will remain in 'grace period' for some days. During this period, users will have the possibility of downloading resources, reading the community contents and sharing them with other @1@ spaces. But you cannot upload anything new. After this period the community will not be accessible.
that we will develop it on @1@

Resources types available to every user

The roles of the community members, ordered by levels of permission in the community, can be: manager, supervisor and user. Each role includes the privileges of the lower. Thus, a resource available to a supervisor will also be available to the manager, but not to a user.

The weaknesses refer to all those elements, resources, skills and attitudes that the actor under analysis already has and that constitute barriers to its good working.({a href="http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/An%C3%A1lisis_DAFO#Debilidades"}Definition obtained from Wikipedia{/a}).

Threats are negative situations outside the program or project that might be a menace to it. So eventually, an appropriate strategy to overcome them may be necessary ({a href="http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/An%C3%A1lisis_DAFO#Amenazas"}Definition obtained from Wikipedia{/a}).

Strengths are those internal and positive elements that make the program, actor or project different from other ones of a similar class ({a href="http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/An%C3%A1lisis_DAFO#Fortalezas"}Definición obtenida de Wikipedia{/a}).

Opportunities are those external positive situations which are generated in the environment and once identified you can take advantage of them ({a href="http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/An%C3%A1lisis_DAFO#Oportunidades"}Definition obtained from Wikipedia{/a}).

page.name: IMPORTARCONTACTOS
page.Resource: Maybe your friends are already on @1@. Find them and invite them to become your contacts.

Maybe your contacts and friends haven't discover @1@ yet. We'll help you. Now you can import your contacts from GMAIL, HOTMAIL and YAHOO. You only have to enter your user and password and the application will allow you to invite the people you want. Once they accept, you'll become contacts on @1@.
You have a good memory, or maybe you've just get the email of an interesting person. Why don't you invite him/her to @1@ and add him/her as contact?
Wrong password or user, try again.
The access to your contacts has been denied. {br /}Click here to import your contacts again.

page.name: MENSAJECOOKIES
page.Resource: We use own and third party cookies to improve your browsing experience. More information in {a href="@1@"}Cookies policy{/a}.

The cookies used on this website are categorised, and you can read about each category below to enable or block some or all of the respective cookies. When you disable categories that were previously enabled, all cookies assigned to that category will be deleted from your web browser. In addition, you can see a list of cookies assigned to each category, and detailed information about them, in the cookie statement.

These are cookies that allow the party responsible for them to monitor and analyse the behaviour of users of the websites to which they are linked, including the quantification of the impact of advertisements. The information collected through this type of cookies is used to measure the activity of the websites, application or platform, in order to introduce improvements based on the analysis of the usage data of the users of the service.
